hero.subtitle: Our platform is designed to minimize PCI scope by using a fully hosted, tokenized payment solution. We use a PCI DSS Level 1–compliant payment processor to ensure absolute integrity.

payment.title: Payment Infrastructure
payment.subtitle: Our payment processing is handled by a PCI DSS Level 1–certified payment provider. We do not store, process, or transmit cardholder data on our servers.

tokenization.title: Client-Side Tokenization
tokenization.description: Sensitive financial data never touches our servers. We use modern web security protocols to ensure your data stays where it belongs.

points.directToGateway: Card data is sent directly to our payment gateway's secure API
points.singleUseToken: Our servers only receive a single-use token
points.zeroExposure: Zero exposure of raw card numbers or CVV codes during transit
points.tlsEncryption: Advanced HTTPS/TLS 1.3 encryption for all communications

storage.title: Secure Data Storage
storage.description: We follow a 'Need-to-Know' policy for data storage. If we don't need it to operate the service, we don't store it.

points.licensedProcessors: Full card data is stored exclusively by licensed processors
points.referenceIds: We only retain reference IDs for recurring billing
points.lastFourOnly: Only the last 4 digits are stored for identification purposes
points.securityAudits: Regular security audits of our data retention policies

dataMatrix.title: Data Transparency
dataMatrix.subtitle: A clear view of what we do and don't store on our systems.

invoicing.title: Automated Invoicing
invoicing.subtitle: Our financial documents are handled through secure API integrations with leading accounting platforms.

tokenAuth.title: Token-Authenticated Access
tokenAuth.description: Our systems authenticate with invoicing partners using time-limited, encrypted access tokens.

webhooks.title: Webhook Integrity
webhooks.description: Payment status updates are verified via authenticated webhooks, ensuring transaction accuracy.

auditTrail.title: Comprehensive Audit Trail
auditTrail.description: All document records are logged locally for your record-keeping and tax compliance.

cta.title: Have security questions?
cta.subtitle: Our compliance team is here to provide any additional information you need.
